body.name: 2024 Professional Wireless Lavalier Microphone for iPhone 15 Pro Max, iPad, Android - 2 Pack Noise Canceling Crystal Clear Recording with USB-C, Live Streaming, YouTube, TikTok

byLineInfo.name: Visit the Mini Mic Pro Store

deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 50 mins
features: NEW 2024 Model with Crystal Clear Audio: Mini Mic Pro utilizes state-of-the-art Series V 2.4GHz digital transmission and proprietary near-zero latency codec with 128-bit encryption, it delivers crystal-clear, incredibly stable audio with a range of up to 260m. Equipped with 2 plush windproof covers and 2pcs replacement Sponge heads, the Wireless audio you can rely on in almost any recording application. With built-in professional-grade intelligent noise reduction chips.

Omnidirectional Sound Reception: Equipped with High Density Spray-proof Sponge and High-sensitivity Microphone, our device clearly records every detail of the sound regardless of surrounded environment. Our Noise Reduction Technology cuts off any noise interference while recording so as to ensure the sound quality

Connect to all of your devices: The upgraded wireless clip-on microphone is equipped with a Lighting connector and a USB-C. Compatible with both iPhone iOS and Android smartphones and tablets, and Windows and Mac computers, better than Bluetooth.

As Seen on TikTok: Our microphone is free of wire and used by top Content Creators, TikTokers, and Youtubers. You can hold it by hand or clip it on your shirt. Helps you get rid of messy wire and clearly record or take videos at a further distance indoors or outdoors.

Rechargeable Battery: The wireless lavalier microphone is built in 65MAH rechargeable batteries up to 4.5 hours operation time with only two-hour charging time. While using the lav mic, you can charge your device simultaneously.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT FOR CONTENT CREATION!
reviews.reviewText: These mics are such great quality for the price.I am a radio and television professional, and these make content creation easier and better soundthan one would expect in a small device that is bluetooth.I really appreciate the different types of pop filters, one smooth for indoor use, and one furry for outdoors. The wind noise is greatly reduced, although it is difficult to put the furry ones on the mic head, as it is a tight fit.The dual mics are perfect for live video for two subjects on camera. The duo I ordered is my second, because I got a new phone with a USB C, as opposed to the lightening port.The plugin transmitter is a little bulky sticking out the end, but it is only a real problem when used with a gimble camera stand/wand.Overall, good product, helpful in creating content, and worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very easy setup.hold up battery for quit long..very useful

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Decent mic for the price and if you are not too picky.
reviews.reviewText: The SUMMARY:It is a perfectly fine mic for casual use, and the noise cancellation is better than my other lapel mic, but I noticed that the mic would always make a crackling noise for the first few seconds of recording sound. It would be mostly fine after that, but the crackling sound would happen again at the beginning of any video with sound or sound recording.I tested it with both mics and the crackling noise would happen every time with either mic.If that's something that will bother you, maybe it makes more sense to spend an extra couple of dollars on a better quality mic.The PROS:** Noise cancellation is VERY good.** The mics charge very fast.** Easy to use.** Decent price.** Extra USB-C to lightning adapter.The CONS:** Crackling noise at the beginning of each sound recording (i.e., if you are recording a video, there won't be any crackling until you start speaking or sound actually is perceived by the mic, then the crackling starts for a few seconds and then stops).** For a couple dollars more, you can get better quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great microphones, im a content creator and this work perfect. Clear sound

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to get the distance right.
reviews.reviewText: They work great as far as plug and play. But it's hard to get the distance right for anything other than just calm speaking. Any peaks in volume and they clip pretty badly. But they do work as advertised.

reviews.reviewerName: Sounds great in my opinion ! (Video included)
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sounds great to me ! (Test Video Included)
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I was looking for an eternity for wireless lapel microphones that were a good deal, sounded great, & connected to USB c so I could easily get a usbc to usb adapter to use them for my computer-Then I found these !Genuinely was taken aback from how good they sound lol. At the time I bought them, they were $9.99 I’m pretty sure? So if it’s any higher than that + tax, I didn’t pay it but probably would pay the new price if it came down to it. Great purchase :) 5/5 stars tbh

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The mic works great
reviews.reviewText: I saw some other reviews, two orders that said the Mic is a scam, but the mic is not a scam. The microphone work, great. So if you want to get them, I would advise you to get them because they come with the adapter that also goes into the old versions of the iPhone 13,14 and below.
